title: The Card-ians of the Galaxy
description:
In our worst-titled episode to date, we're doing double duty! Join us for a discussion of the extra-creepy deckbuilder Inscryption and the surprisingly charming Guardians of the Galaxy. 

Other media discussed: Hearthstone, Telltale's Guardians of the Galaxy, Death's Gambit Afterlife, lots of Godzilla films, Doom Patrol, Nightmare Alley
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
